text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi I went to the doctor today. The doctors from Bakersfield were correct. The virus is not that deadly. The virus is actually man made combination of the corona-virus and measles. Kids are not getting it because they have received the vaccines for the measles and pneumonia. #COVID19
